definition: to die/to shoot dead/to reject/to fall forward/(suffix) to death
to collapse/variant of 斃|毙[bi4]/variant of 獙[bi4]

sentences.english: Comrade Li Zhu shot dead on the spot.
sentences.chinese: 李竹同志当场击毙死亡。

sentences.english: Captain Jones raised his gun and bang, another Indian bit the dust.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯上尉举起枪开了火，又一个印军被击毙了。

sentences.english: The Bani walid Green resistance has killed hundreds of Rebels at Outskirt desert.
sentences.chinese: 绿色抵抗武装在郊区的沙漠击毙数百名反对派。

sentences.english: Osama bin Laden was killed, not captured.
sentences.chinese: 奥萨马本拉登被击毙而非被捕。

sentences.english: It usually kills the bird with a single quick blow of its talons.
sentences.chinese: 通常它只需用鹰爪快速一击就能击毙被追猎的鸟。

sentences.english: He killed another three people before he was shot dead by police.
sentences.chinese: 在他被警方击毙以前还枪杀了另外三个人。

sentences.english: One looter was killed when the 2 sides exchanged fire.
sentences.chinese: 双方发生交火，一名哄抢者被击毙。

sentences.english: Herold surrendered to the police, but Booth refused to lay down his arms and was shot dead.
sentences.chinese: 赫罗尔德向警方投降，布斯则拒绝缴械而被击毙。

sentences.english: The kidnapper was shot dead then and there by the armed policeman.
sentences.chinese: 绑架者被武装警察当时当地击毙。

sentences.english: Kill 25 enemies while suspended from a rope.
sentences.chinese: 攀吊着绳索的情况下共击毙25个敌人。

sentences.english: "Mullah Omar was killed on way from Quetta to North Waziristan, "TOLO television said in its news bulletin.
sentences.chinese: 奥马尔在从基达前往瓦齐里斯坦北部的途中被击毙。

sentences.english: When the president rose to speak, the terrorists blasted him down.
sentences.chinese: 当总统站起来演说时，那些恐怖分子把他击毙了。

sentences.english: They shot and killed him, as well as wounding a woman with him.
sentences.chinese: 他们击毙了他，也打伤了一为陪同本拉登的女性。

sentences.english: Lin Wu Yang know flower elder sister, carry a gun shot and killed two village cadres.
sentences.chinese: 林午阳知晓花姐用意，提枪将两名村干部击毙。

sentences.english: He was shot on the spot for resisting arrest.
sentences.chinese: 他因拒捕而被当场击毙。

sentences.english: Lots of bell ringers were killed by lightning.
sentences.chinese: 许多敲钟人被闪电击毙。

definition: to shoot dead (with a gun, or bow and arrow)
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
to meet violent death/to get killed
to be wounded/to sustain an injury
to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
